title: Ep. 216: Oxidizing Makeup, DIY Pineapple Masks & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 216: Oxidizing Makeup, DIY Pineapple Masks & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: Welcome to our new format! Every Tuesday, we'll talk about the beauty news, answer your questions, share tips and advice, and just generally hang out and have fun. Every Thursday, we’ll drop a (slightly longer) episode featuring an interview with ...
description:
Welcome to our new format! Every Tuesday, we'll talk about the beauty news, answer your questions, share tips and advice, and just generally hang out and have fun. Every Thursday, we’ll drop a (slightly longer) episode featuring an interview with a big name in the beauty world. ••• In this episode, we explain why makeup can change colors as you wear it (and what to do about it), find out if pineapple is actually good for your skin, and discuss the headlines: Morphe cuts ties with Jeffree Star; Patrick Starrr launches a new line; Lady Gaga fronts Valentino’s new fragrance; Gabrielle Union and Larry Sims relaunch their hair care brand; perms are back; and Dior Perfumes releases a podcast. -- Want more Fat Mascara? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email : info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
